statements: DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE age < 30 AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE age > 60 AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Smith';
